actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain married individuals who file separate returns to be taxed as unmarried individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow married individuals who do not file a joint income tax return to elect to be taxed as unmarried individuals.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain married individuals who file separate returns to be taxed as unmarried individuals.
